subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_004C_01C9BADB.AF0319F0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

That's what I mean by first establishing that the spirit has given me trust=
worthy info consistently. If it hasn't, then the experiment stops there, at=
 least with that entity.

But this is all AFTER I have proven that I am eve=
n conversing with an entity of course.

April

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: threadsintyme@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Saturday, April 11, 2009 4:58 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testi=
ng






  April,

  What if the spirit lies? Or fails to tell the truth?
 =
 Al
  ---------- Original Message ----------
  From: "April Abercrombie" <a=
pril@...>
  To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
  Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing
  Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 16:55:22 -060=
0




  I would try it both ways -solo and with another person. However I w=
ould limit it to just me and one other trustworthy person.


  "How would y=
ou go about determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in bet=
ween life and the other side), a spirit (someone that's crossed over and ca=
me back to say high) and some other type of entity?"

  Only after establis=
hing that I am indeed communicating with a spirit, and that spirit has give=
n me trustworthy info consistently, at that point I would simply ask what i=
t's nature is.

  April

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: lori b=
ogren 
    To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, April 11, 2009 =
2:48 PM
    Subject: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing


    April~
     
    A=
re you planning on doing this solo or working with a team?
     
    How wo=
uld you go about determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck i=
n between life and the other side), a spirit (someone that's crossed over a=
nd came back to say high) and some other type of entity?
     
    ~Lori


=


    "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
    --Anne Rice =
 Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 



      




-----=
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
   =
 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    From: april@...
 =
   Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 22:37:13 -0600
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alte=
rnative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.





    Well, if my husband would=
 let me actually experiment with one, that would be the first step LOL!

  =
  But what I would try and do is get some kind of verifiable information fr=
om the "entity" that I contact with the board to prove that it is communica=
tion from an actual, intelligent being and not just my own motor responses =
making he planchette move. It would have to be information that I have no k=
nowledge of.

    If I could do that, and consistently, then I would be com=
fortable saying that I am actually talking to a spirit.

    The reason I h=
ave my doubts is that you have to be touching the planchette to get it to m=
ove. If it were an actual spirit, I would think that shouldn't be necessary=
. We all know ghosts can a do move objects.

    But this brings up another=
 mystery - if the Ouija board is actual spirit communication, maybe there i=
s a difference between the entities you can contact with it and your common=
 ghost.

    April

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: lori bo=
gren 
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009=
 9:50 PM
      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hun=
ter stuff.


      April~
       
      Hm, finally I'm intrigued again.
  =
     
      How do you about the process?
       
      ~Lori




      "My=
 life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
      --Anne Rice  Respon=
ding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 



        




----------=
----------------------------------------------------------------
      To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      From: april@...
    =
  Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 18:36:30 -0600
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alt=
ernative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.


      .


      When it comes t=
o the Ouija, I just want to study it to find out if it is really spirit com=
munication, or just kinetic energy or your subconscious mind moving the pla=
nchette.

      I agree that we all have the ability for extra sensory perc=
eption, just some are better at it than others. Like running, for instance.=
 We all can run, but some are naturally better at it. Still, with practice =
we can get better.

      But that is not my aim with the Ouija.


        =
----- Original Message ----- 
        From: lori bogren 
        To: evp-it=
c@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 6:11 PM
        Sub=
ject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.


     =
   April~
         
        You forgot yawn from boredom, that's what I do.=

         
        Use it, don't use it.  I don't care.  But why bother.  W=
hen people ask me I usually suggest that if they want to communicate with .=
.. whatever why not develop the ability yourself.  - ya, I'm one of those w=
ho believe anyone can.
         
        There's always the question in the=
 back of your mind whether your partner's moving it.  The intentions of "wh=
at" you are talking to.  Not to mention it's too slow and limited.
        =
 
        Besides if you take the time to develop the ability you can get m=
ore texture in the information.  Asking the board "where you married?" may =
get you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense of a religious or civil c=
eremonhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party, or whether that Being =
approved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a reluctant union).
       =
  
        ~Lori
